  • TTypedElementList

References

   
Module TypedElementFramework
Header /Engine/Source/Runtime/TypedElementFramework/Public/Elements/Framework/TypedElementList.h
Include #include "Elements/Framework/TypedElementList.h"

Syntax

template<class HandleType>  
class TTypedElementList : public TSharedFromThis< TTypedElementList< HandleType > >

Remarks

A list of element handles. Provides high-level access to groups of elements, including accessing elements that implement specific interfaces.

Constructors

No constructors are accessible with public or protected access.

  Type Name Description
HandleType

operator[] ( const int32 InIndex
)

 Get the element handle at the given index. Use IsValidIndex to test for validity.

Classes

  Type Name Description
FLegacySync Interface to allow external systems (such as USelection) to receive immediate sync notifications as an element list is changed.  
FLegacySyncScopedBatch Helper to batch immediate sync notifications for legacy code.  
FOnChanged Access the delegate that is invoked whenever this element list has been changed.  
FOnPreChange Access the delegate that is invoked whenever this element list is potentially about to change.  
FScopedClearNewPendingChange A utility struct that help to cancel any new pending notification that happened in a scope.
